creditCodeModal.title: Credit transfer
creditCodeModal.tip1: Please copy the redemption code and provide it to the User ID. The recipient need go to the Credit Redemption page and enter the code to complete the redemption before the Credit expires.
creditCodeModal.tip2: The records of this transfer (including the Redemption codes) can be viewed on the Credit history page.

creditTransferModal.title: Credit transfer
creditTransferModal.receiverIdTip: Can be viewed in Account & usage page > basic information
creditTransferModal.viewReceiveRecordRight: viewed in the Credit History page
creditTransferModal.validationReceiverIdRequired: Please enter the recipient's User ID
creditTransferModal.validationSelectCreditRequired: Please select at least one item to transfer Credits
creditTransferModal.redeemCodeAlreadyRedeemed: This redemption code has already been used and cannot be redeemed again.
creditTransferModal.redeemCodeExpiredReminder: Credit has expired. Please initiate a new transfer
creditTransferModal.redeemCodeError: Invalid redemption code. Please try again
creditTransferModal.invalidUUID: Please enter a valid UUID format
creditTransferModal.onlySupportCreditTransfer: Currently, only Credits received by starring the project on GitHub can be transferred,

homePage.creditDesc: The Credit consumption per request varies across different modelsï¼Œonly advanced models will calculate the usage of Credit.
homePage.planDesc: If your credits are running low and you can't continue using the premium model, complete the following tasks to get more credits!
homePage.githubStar: Get 50 Credits (automatically effective within 5 minutes) for your first star on the CoStrict open-source project on GitHub.
homePage.usageConsumptionDesc: View your detailed usage consumption records
homePage.subscriptionDesc: Subscription management features are under development...

rewardPlan.title: Credits Reward Plan
rewardPlan.invitationCode: Invitation method (choose one of the two)
rewardPlan.invitationCodeText: Please fill in the invitation code on the login/registration page. If missed, Credits cannot be distributed.
rewardPlan.rulesTitle: Invite new users to register, the new user will receive 250 Credits, and the inviter will receive 200 Credits
rewardPlan.operationGuideSubtitle: (New users can follow the instructions to complete tasks)
rewardPlan.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions, please contact us. Scan the QR code below to join the official communication group.
rewardPlan.introTitle: Running out of credits? Don't worry! ðŸ”¥
rewardPlan.introContent: CoStrict officially launches the Credits Reward Program - complete the tasks below to easily earn credits and enjoy AI programming without burden. Invite friends to participate, collect more Credits, and explore unlimited possibilities!
rewardPlan.participationStep3: 3. Wait for rewards to be automatically credited!

operationGuide.task2Title: Task 2: Click Star on GitHub to bookmark the CoStrict project
operationGuide.task3Title: Task 3: Install the CoStrict product and experience its features
operationGuide.step1Content: Please confirm that the invitation code has been automatically filled in (if not, please enter it manually). Use GitHub to log in.
operationGuide.step1Tips: If you do not have a GitHub account, follow the guided process to register first.
operationGuide.step2Header: After login, the page will automatically redirect to the User Info & Quota Usage page.
operationGuide.step2Tips: If you do not have a GitHub account, follow the guided process to register first.
operationGuide.step3Content: Please follow the official documentation to complete CoStrict plugin installation and login, and successfully send a conversation
operationGuide.visitGithub: Visit the CoStrict project page on GitHub, click the Star button to bookmark the project.
operationGuide.completePluginInstall: Please refer to the official documentation to complete the installation and login of the CoStrict, successfully send one conversation.

rules.rule1: 1. For each new user invited to register a CoStrict account, the new user immediately gets
rules.rule2: 2. New user downloads the CoStrict plugin, completes a simple conversation, and clicks Star on GitHub to favorite CoStrict:
rules.rule3: 3. Existing users inviting multiple new users to register through invitation code/link can have rewards stacked.

qa.question1: How to check if Credits have been deposited?
qa.answer1: Go to the "Usage" module on the User Info & Quota Usage page and check the "Credit History" section for detailed credit deposit records.
qa.question2: Why didn't I receive the correct amount of Credits after completing tasks?

answer2.before: Credits are typically deposited within a few minutes. If you haven't received them after an extended period, please contact us via email:
answer2.after: . We will respond as soon as possible.

qa.accountBinding: Bind GitHub account in the basic information module of the User Info & Quota Usage page.
qa.basicInfoModule: ) basic information module to bind GitHub account.

activityCard.githubStarDesc: First time clicking star on CoStrict open source project on GitHub, get 200 Credits (automatically effective within 10 minutes)
activityCard.inviteNewUserDesc: Invite new users to register, inviter gets 400 Credits, new user gets 250 Credits.

inviteRules.rule1: For each new user invited to register CoStrict account, new user immediately gets 200 Credits, inviter gets 100 Credits;
inviteRules.rule2: New user downloads CoStrict plugin and stars on GitHub:
inviteRules.rule2a: a. New user gets additional 300 Credits (total 500 Credits).
inviteRules.rule2b: b. Inviter gets additional 300 Credits (total 400 Credits).
inviteRules.rule3: Rewards can be stacked, the more new users invited, the more Credits.

login.getUserInfoBeforeLogin: Log in to view user information and credit usage
